lead_paragraph: Everton striker Romelu Lukaku is on the brink of a sealing a new deal with the Premier League club, the Belgian's agent Mino Raiola has said.

headline.print_headline: Everton's Lukaku on Verge of Signing New Deal-Agent
headline.main: Everton's Lukaku on Verge of Signing New Deal-Agent

snippet: Everton striker Romelu Lukaku is on the brink of a sealing a new deal with the Premier League club, the Belgian's agent Mino Raiola has said....
